data.text: @pjie2 @Dr_D_Robertson Early peaks hold rather synced rise and fall relationship between hospital admissions and patients on ventilators. The good doctor is missing the important point made by the Danish government. Of/ with now matters. So hospital admissions are not a good measure to draw conclusions
@Dr_D_Robertson Deaths increasing in Scotland - omicron getting into older age groups?  Cases shooting up too, but relatively flat on Zoe
@randomuser3217B @Dr_D_Robertson Even more lagged so the rise hasn't fed through yet: has been at best flat for the last two weeks.
@Dr_D_Robertson Why are you missing the most reliable metric at this stage, which is patients in intensive case? https://t.co/fKKsfC2e3W
@Dr_D_Robertson Not surprising. But total silence from govt and media.
